name: Word Explorer - Puzzle Game
description:
Are you bored of the same old repetitive levels in most mini crossword games? Do your funny word games for iPhone/iPad instantly stop being fun when you spot a blunder in their English? Word Explorer offers a whole new word fill in experience!

From the creators of Word Farm – Animal Kingdom comes the fresh mini crossword game with charming characters, beautiful graphics, and unique handcrafted levels! The word fill in mechanics are your ticket to explore the amazing game world with Bindi and Eggsy the Dodo.

The difficulty increases as you progress, making Word Explorer a fun word game for adults and children alike. Play for fun, for vocabulary practice, or use this funny word game for iPhone/iPad as your own way to unscramble letters missing in your paper crosswords.

HOW TO PLAY
- Scramble and unscramble letters! Connect them into words!
- Rearrange the letters with the “Shuffle” button
- Reveal hints by tapping “?”
- Invite a friend to help you!

FEATURES
- Available for phones and tablets.
- No Wifi, no problem! Play offline, anywhere, anytime!
- Awesome bonuses for completing daily challenges!
- Great for building your vocabulary and improving memory!
- Unique levels and increasing difficulty make Word Explorer a fun word game for adults as well as children!
